mapper.insert: insert into t_orddetail (id, od_num, ord_id, ord_num, tran_cont, tran_type, tran_id, price, price_add, count, ord_time, deliver_time, sub_total, create_r_date, create_time, create_user, create_username, update_time, ordered, delflag, remark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{odNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tranId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceAdd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{deliverTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{subTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createRDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ordered,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delflag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select id, od_num, ord_id, ord_num, tran_cont, tran_type, tran_id, price, price_add, count, ord_time, deliver_time, sub_total, create_r_date, create_time, create_user, create_username, update_time, ordered, delflag, remark from t_orddetail
